Gong.Name: YuriHakuLaw
Gong.Desc: One of the lost arts, through this law you will achieve incredible speed and be able to control the Water and Wind elements to release it in the form of Ice.
Gong.SelectDesc: This Law is not for the Weak, you will need to Suffer like Prey to eventually become the Hunter. Do you accept this Path?

Stage.Name: Stage1
Stage.Desc: The first state on this Law. Requires a peaceful mind and a long time of meditation. It is harder for an intelligent person to banish thoughts from their mind and pass this state.

Neck.Desc: Concentrate one's mind and banish other random thoughts in meditation. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough will be more difficult for characters with high intelligence.[/color]

After concentration, further perceive the internal change in one's body, like a blind person feeling their surroundings, and finally reach the state of being able to sense the condition of one's internal organs. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough will be more difficult for characters with high intelligence.[/color]

As introspection progresses, one will be able to find the first Qi Sense in meditation. It is the beginning of Stamina Conversion, which is called the 'First Perception'. [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough will be more difficult for characters with low Qi sense. \nFailing to breakthrough may lead to injury.[/color]
In this state, you need to gradually increase inner Qi and drive it through the Governing and Conception Vessels to create an inner cycle. This is called the 'Universal Cycle'.

Stage.Name: Stage2
Stage.Desc: The second state in this Law. Requires risking one's life for a regulation between Water and Fire, in order to form one Golden Core.

Neck.Desc: 打开玄关，沟通天地。仙凡自此两别。
真气充盈全身，达到圆满之境。
倒转五内，燃烧寿元，以胸腹为鼎，心为火，肾为水，铸就结丹鼎炉。[color=#D06508]\n此瓶颈根骨越低，越难突破。\n突破失败可能会受伤。[/color]
精气神合一，结成金丹，奠定道基。

Stage.Name: Stage3
Stage.Desc: 修行的第三重境界，抟气致柔，能如婴儿乎？此境界了悟真我，方得逍遥。

Neck.Desc: 金丹初成，天降雷劫阻成道。
返照金丹，真我自金丹中出现，仿佛人体初始，从无到有缓慢凝结。[color=#D06508]\n此瓶颈悟性越低，越难突破。[/color]
滋养真我，逐渐壮大，蠢蠢欲动。[color=#D06508]此瓶颈根骨越低，越难突破。[/color]
自封神通，返璞归真之中，元婴出现，打破肉身之牢笼，此谓之地仙境界。

Stage.Name: Stage4
Stage.Desc: 修行的第四重境界，元婴于此境界历经雷劫洗礼化为纯阳，可以解脱肉身，飞升成仙。

Neck.Desc: 以地母太阴之息凝练元神，使之成长。
自开天门，脱壳而出，逍遥天地。[color=#D06508]\n突破此瓶颈会大损寿元，需要注意。[/color]
以元神得天道之妙，一旦过此关，将直面天劫。[color=#D06508]\n此瓶颈很难突破，且无经验加成。[/color]
天地间反噬到来，度过劫难仙途在望，反之灰飞烟灭。
